label: Highest level of education [ISCED 2011]
Mlstr_harmo::algorithm:
case_when(
educc7 %in% c(7) ~ 7L,
educc7 %in% c(5,6) ~ 6L,
educc7 %in% c(3,4) ~ 4L,
abschlus %in% c(3,4) ~ 3L,
abschlus %in% c(1,2) ~ 2L,
abschlus %in% c(5) ~ 0L,
TRUE ~ NA_integer_)

label: Amount of daily tobacco smoked [g/day]
Mlstr_harmo::algorithm:
ifelse(is.na(zt3),
                      ifelse(is.na(zr3), 
                             ifelse(is.na(pf3),0,pf3*5),
                             ifelse(is.na(pf3),zr3*5,zr3*5+pf3*5)),
                      ifelse(is.na(zr3),
                             ifelse(is.na(pf3),zt3*1,zt3*1+pf3*5),
                             ifelse(is.na(pf3),zt3*1+zr3*5, zt3*1+ zr3*5 + pf3*5)))

label: Age at time of quitting smoking [years]
Menopause status
Mlstr_harmo::comment: no distinction between pre- and perimenopausal possible, hence this was mapped to premenopausal category in harmonized variable

label: Use of contraceptive pills or injections [years]
Number of live births given [Nr. of birth]
Mlstr_harmo::comment: number of children as proxy for number of pregnancies

label: Age at the first given birth [years]
First degree family history of premature CHD and stroke
First degree family history of T2D
First degree family history of cancer
Regular use of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs
CVD event during follow-up
Mlstr_harmo::algorithm:
case_when(
  casemi_fup5 %in% c(2,5) | casestroke_fup5 %in% c(2,6) | casehf_fup5 == 2 ~ 1L,
  casemi_fup5 %in% c(0) | casestroke_fup5 %in% c(0) | casehf_fup5 %in% c(0) ~ 0L,
  TRUE ~ NA_integer_)
Mlstr_harmo::comment: 0=not diseased; 1= prevalent; 2=incident; 3= incident I15 (Sekundärhypertonie, aufgrund einer anderen Erkrankung); 5=I252 old MI, date of diagnosis unknown; 6=I64Y old stroke, date of diagnosis unknown; 8=incident DCO; 9= incident (not yet verified); 1, 3, 8 (nur Totenschein, nicht verifiziert; aber für Mortalitätsanalyse verwendbar), 9

label: Age at diagnosis of CVD [years]
Mlstr_harmo::algorithm:
as.numeric(pmin(age0 + ((dd_inchf - d_recrui)/365.25),
                     age0 + ((dd_incstroke - d_recrui)/365.25),
                     age0 + ((dd_incmi - d_recrui)/365.25), na.rm = TRUE))

label: Age at diagnosis of angina pectoris [years]
Myocardial infarction during follow-up
Mlstr_harmo::algorithm:
case_when(
casemi_fup5 %in% c(2,5) ~ 1L,
casemi_fup5 %in% c(0) ~ 0L,
TRUE ~ NA_integer_)
Mlstr_harmo::comment: 0=not diseased; 1= prevalent; 2=incident; 3= incident I15; 5=I252 old MI, date of diagnosis unknown; 6=I64Y old stroke, date of diagnosis unknown; 8=incident DCO; 9= incident (not yet verified); 1,3, 6, 8, 9 should be excluded

label: Age at diagnosis of myocardial infarction [years]
Stroke during follow-up
Mlstr_harmo::algorithm:
case_when(
casestroke_fup5 %in% c(2,6) ~ 1L,
casestroke_fup5 %in% c(0) ~ 0L,
TRUE ~ NA_integer_)
Mlstr_harmo::comment: 0=not diseased; 1= prevalent; 2=incident; 3= incident I15; 5=I252 old MI, date of diagnosis unknown; 6=I64Y old stroke, date of diagnosis unknown; 8=incident DCO; 9= incident (not yet verified); 1, 3, 5, 8, 9 should be excluded

label: Cerebral infarction (ischaemic stroke) during follow-up
Mlstr_harmo::comment: nur yes/no kodiert (abgeleitet aus dem ICD-10 Code)

label: Age at diagnosis of cerebral infarction (ischaemic stroke) [years]
Age at diagnosis of haemorrhagic stroke [years]
Essential hypertension during follow-up
Mlstr_harmo::comment: 0=not diseased; 1= prevalent; 2=incident; 3= incident I15; 5=I252 old MI, date of diagnosis unknown; 6=I64Y old stroke, date of diagnosis unknown; 8=incident DCO; 9= incident (not yet verified); 1, 3, 8, 9 should be excluded

label: Age at diagnosis of essential hypertension [years]
Age at diagnosis of heart failure [years]
Diabetes mellitus type 2 during follow-up
Mlstr_harmo::comment: 0=not diseased; 1= prevalent; 2=incident;3= incident I15; 4=inc. Diabetes (other types); 5=I252 old MI, date of diagnosis unknown; 6=I64Y old stroke, date of diagnosis unknown; 8=incident DCO; 9= incident (not yet verified); 1, 3, 5, 6, 8, 9 should be excluded

label: Age at diagnosis of diabetes mellitus type 2 [years]
Cancer during follow-up
Mlstr_harmo::comment: first occuring tumor (derived from ICDO2 or ICDO3 code); yes/no coded

label: Age at diagnosis of cancer [years]
Mlstr_harmo::comment: if inccanc_fup5=1, then take dd_inccanc; if inccanc_fup5 = 0, then take dcens_canc

label: Vital status at the end of mortality follow-up
Vital status at the end of CVD mortality follow-up
Mlstr_harmo::comment: vitstat5 is used in all cases

Mlstr_harmo::comment: vitstat5 is used in all cases
